DrugName: Iron supplements with saturation levels below target range
Allopurinol or Febuxostat for gout management
Vitamin D and calcium supplements to correct deficiency
Topiramate or Zonisamide for weight loss in morbid obesity
Loratadine or Azelastine nasal spray as an alternative to Fluticasone Propionate
Gabapentin or Duloxetine for chronic pain management
Hormonal therapy (e.g., birth control pills) for menstrual regulation and potential osteoporosis prevention
